tgt_original: tvanmatena tveṣāṁ pariśeṣasiddhirna bhavatīti darśayannāha- sattvaṁ tvasiddhamityādi |

evaṁ tāvad dṛṣṭādṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhamabhyupetyānu- mānābhāva uktaḥ ||  samprati pratiṣedha evāyukta iti darśayannāha- yadyadarśanamātre- ṇetyādi |  mātragrahaṇenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yadadarśanam tata evābhāvaḥ sidhyatīti sūcayati |

anyathā yadyanupalabdhisiddha eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt evaṁ sati yathā ghaṭābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate tathā dṛṣṭānto'pi nirupākhyaṁ vyomakusumādyapareṇa dṛṣṭāntena sādhyeta |  so'pyapareṇetyanavasthā prasajyeta |
(129) bhavatu nāmaivaṁvidhānupalabdhiḥ pramāṇam |  sā punaḥ kathamanumānam |  kathaṁ ca na syāt |
